analysis.description:
ReporterTokenSale.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x31cd4e0345c75739cd7ce973b152ef20653a5740.sol#444-467) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- multiSig.transfer(this.balance) (/unique_contracts/0x31cd4e0345c75739cd7ce973b152ef20653a5740.sol#462-463)

ReporterTokenSale.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x31cd4e0345c75739cd7ce973b152ef20653a5740.sol#444-467) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- token.balanceOf(beneficiary) == 0

ReporterTokenSale.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x31cd4e0345c75739cd7ce973b152ef20653a5740.sol#444-467) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- token.balanceOf(beneficiary) == 0
ReporterTokenSale.placeTokens (/unique_contracts/0x31cd4e0345c75739cd7ce973b152ef20653a5740.sol#426-443) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- token.balanceOf(beneficiary) == 0

Reentrancy in ReporterTokenSale.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x31cd4e0345c75739cd7ce973b152ef20653a5740.sol#444-467):
	External calls:
	- token.balanceOf(beneficiary) == 0 (/unique_contracts/0x31cd4e0345c75739cd7ce973b152ef20653a5740.sol#454-456)
	State variables written after the call(s):

ReporterTokenSale.placeTokens (/unique_contracts/0x31cd4e0345c75739cd7ce973b152ef20653a5740.sol#426-443) does not use the value returned by external calls:

ReporterTokenSale.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x31cd4e0345c75739cd7ce973b152ef20653a5740.sol#444-467) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x31cd4e0345c75739cd7ce973b152ef20653a5740.sol#459-460)

ReporterTokenSale.finishSale (/unique_contracts/0x31cd4e0345c75739cd7ce973b152ef20653a5740.sol#469-475) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(multiSig,unassigned) (/unique_contracts/0x31cd4e0345c75739cd7ce973b152ef20653a5740.sol)
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_contracts/0x31cd4e0345c75739cd7ce973b152ef20653a5740.sol)

ReporterTokenSale.emergencyERC20Drain (/unique_contracts/0x31cd4e0345c75739cd7ce973b152ef20653a5740.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
